sentences.sContent: My salary is paid into my bank account.
sentences.sCn: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.sContent: I’ve opened an account with Barclay’s Bank.
sentences.sCn: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.sContent: My husband and I have a joint account (=  one that is shared between two people  ) .
sentences.sCn: 我和丈夫有个联名账户。

sentences.sContent: ...Renewables account for only a small share of global primary energy consumption...
...We need very broad participation to fully address global tragedy that results when countries fail to take into account the negative impact of their carbon emissions on the rest of the world...
...There are several factors to be taken into account when we agree on “seek to understand others...
...These results held true even taking into account that many of the women in the study were breast-feeding their babies...
...stress-related health problems account for up to 90% of hospital visits...
...The use of magstripe cards by American retailers leaves consumers exposed to the risks of losing account information...
...Your vital account information lives on the second track...
...law enforcement and technology companies are all trying to stop a network of hackers who are succeeding in stealing account numbers...
...coding the account number and expiration date...
...The findings of the national survey of college freshmen about the impact of single-sex schooling fail to take into account student and school attributes...
